original_text: Let them be confounded and put to shame that seek after my soul: let them be turned back and brought to confusion that devise my hurt.
korean_text: 내 생명을 찾는 자들이 부끄러워 수치를 당하게 하시며 나를 상해하려 하는 자들이 물러가 낭패를 당하게 하소서

sentences.original_text: Let them be confounded and put to shame
let them be turned back and brought to confusion
